title: Shipping Cost Calculator
description: Write a program that calculates the shipping cost based on the weight and distance of the package. If the weight is less than 1 kg and the distance is less than 100 km, the shipping cost is $5. If the weight is between 1 kg and 5 kg and the distance is between 100 km and 500 km, the shipping cost is $10. If the weight is above 5 kg or the distance is above 500 km, the shipping cost is $20.
